title: Psychology, Trauma and the Church with Eamon and Kathryn Wilson (whole conversation)
description:
Kathryn is well known on the BoM Discord server. I've gotten to know Eamon quite well over the last year or so. I wanted to talk to them about trauma and the church. Lots of nuggets in this one.

My conversation with Kathryn's brother of Urban Abbey https://youtu.be/oWQ8bUrYPhU
